statements.query: MATCH (o:AWSOrganization) WHERE o.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH o LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (o) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount)-[r:BELONG_TO]->(:AWSOrganization) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
